sample_docs: Digital Twins to Enable Remote First Options for Businesses According to the recent Internet of Things (IoT) implementation survey done by Gartner, 13% of organizations implementing IoT projects already use Digital Twins, while 62% are either in the process of establishing its use or plan to do so. Digital Twins represents the convergence of the physical and the virtual world where every industrial product will get a dynamic digital representation. In a way, they are the virtual replicas of physical devices that data scientists and IT pros can use to run simulations before actual devices are built and deployed. Digital Twins help businesses in becoming Remote-First through remote commissioning and diagnostics of products that are already in the field, helping in lowering service costs, and enhancing customer satisfaction. Additionally, they can troubleshoot equipment in remote locations to reduce incident resolution time. Similarly, when new products are to be commissioned for clients, configuration can be performed remotely by service personnel. With Digital Twins entering the mainstream, exciting new technological developments such as remote or autonomous machine operations, automation and predictive maintenance, can be achieved. Digital Twins can act as a trainer for an AI, tirelessly repeating scenarios and generating data to learn from. It is changing how technologies such as IoT, AI and Deep Learning are optimized. In this webinar, you will learn about: This webinar on Digital Twins will touch upon various aspects of the concept. Some of the topics that will be explained in detail in the webinar includes: Digital Twins concepts, its rising prominence & applications across industries How Digital Twins help businesses in becoming Remote-First, saving costs and time Difference between regular simulator and Digital Twins How AI rewrites the possibilities of Digital Twins Deep Learning & Digital Twins Deep Learning-based Digital Twins in semiconductor manufacturing How to drive business value and sustainability with Digital Twins Live Demo and Use Cases on Digital Twins Please write to marketing@innominds.com and we will share with you the access to the portal where you can play around and experience the Digital Twins of a lithium ion battery. Ravi is EVP at Innominds and responsible for creating digital solutions and IP. As a passionate Big Data and AI practitioner, he has delivered solutions in several industries. Sai is the CMO at Innominds and brings 20+ years of overall industry experience with a deep understanding of technologies, solutions and IP-led software services offerings.

Future-Ready Product Engineering for Scalability At Innominds, we specialize in creating intelligent and scalable software solutions. Our expert engineering team integrates advanced technologies throughout the software lifecycle. Leverage our expertise in low-code platforms, cloud engineering, and microservices architecture to build agile, scalable and sustainable products. We embed intelligence in every phase of the software lifecycle, ensuring agility and efficiency. Harness the power of GenAI to accelerate time-to-market and build reliable software. With over 500 high-quality products delivered, our engineering DNA embodies excellence. Rapid development cycles and a flexible approach allow us to tailor services to your evolving needs. "Product engineering and IoT are reshaping the healthcare landscape with innovations that help reduce healthcare costs, encourage patient engagement, improve population health, and, ultimately, make healthcare more accessible and transparent at all levels." - MARKETSANDMARKETS Global Construction Tools Company Increased tool usage by 60% with a tracking software solution. Saved over 320 person-hours in developing a new application. Leverage iSymphony™, our low-code platform with an intuitive drag-and-drop UI, for rapid application development with high-quality, compliant code. Our software products and digital engineering services create tangible outcomes for leading global enterprises. Benefit from the latest technologies customized for you through our network of technology partners. Unique enterprise data catalogue product across multiple form factors that enables a new way of experiencing data for Tableau users Our client is a software company that offers enterprise cloud data management and data integration products, helping businesses unlock the value of their data. Our client partnered with Tableau to bring the rich metadata context directly from Enterprise Data Catalogue (EDC) to the UI context of Tableau and needed help with developing a UI solution to build the integrated product. Download this case study and know how Innominds: Designed and developed new features of integrated client and Tableau product along with UX to create a user-centric and seamless experience Built the UI solution to enable an effective collaboration of stakeholders on a data set and make it consistent with existing tools and processes

Code Refactoring Solutions for Enterprise Excellence Embark on your enterprise transformation journey with clean code from Innominds. Our innovative engineering framework helps minimize technical debt, ensuring your codebase remains maintainable and efficient. With a model-driven approach, we reduce the need for manual coding, maintaining your system's functionality and performance. We work with you to assess technical debt based on severity, risk, and urgency, allowing developers to focus on the most critical issues. Refactoring your codebase ensures long-term stability and streamlines future development, improving overall quality and performance. Our well-documented code and streamlined workflows fastrack development cycles and feature integration, reducing effort by up to 50% and saving valuable time. Through proactive approaches like containerization and modular design, we minimize ongoing maintenance costs and reduce overall workload. Ensure Security and Agility We uphold the highest security standards while fostering a culture of continuous improvement, enabling your team to improve agility and resilience. "Technical debt can hinder growth, decelerate your organization's ability to seize emerging market opportunities. According to a survey, 70% of CIOs, CTOs, and other technology leaders view technical debt as a significant barrier to innovation." - Forbes Global Construction Tools Company Increased tool usage by 60% with a tracking software solution. Saved over 320 person-hours in developing a new application. Seamlessly integrate edge computing and cloud-based training for smarter operations. Elevating Digital Experiences through Immersive, User-Centric De today's experience-driven world, delivering a rich user experience is essential for customer satisfaction. Yet 70% of CX leaders struggle to create initiatives that enhance loyalty and drive results. At Innominds, we are dedicated to providing innovative experiences that drive digital product success. Leveraging AI and human-centric design strategies, we redefine every aspect of the customer journey. Our strong emphasis on UI and intelligent design, combined with seamless integrations with platforms like Salesforce, Adobe Experience Management, and Microsoft Power Platform, ensures a cohesive and engaging user experience. Hyper-Personalization with Accessibility & Intelligence-Embedded Design Deliver seamless user experiences, enabling easy access to information, purchases, and assistance across any channel or device. Utilize data and analytics to tailor the customer journey, ensuring each interaction is personalized and relevant. Ensure consistent experiences across all touchpoints on web, mobile, or any platform. Proactive & Responsive Support: Access instant, personalized support through live chat, chatbots, and AI-powered assistants. " Over 70% of CX leaders struggle to design projects that increase customer loyalty and achieve results. Marketing leaders must develop effective customer experience strategies to optimise customer interactions and drive business outcomes. " - Gartner Asset-tracking solution with engaging user experience helping construction professionals to easily find, track, and manage assets Based on the mobile form factor, detailed wireframes were designed to achieve the best possible user experience, keeping in mind the OS platform patterns and capabilities. Created the UX design for an AI-driven Physical Security App Our UX team worked on the concept based on UX design principles such as minimal input and maximum output, design for forgiveness, design for trust, and humanizing experiences. Unleash the power of automated testing with our comprehensive, open-source AI platform . Effortlessly create and execute tests across diverse platforms like web, mobile, APIs, desktops, and even mainframes. Our AI-powered approach simplifies test creation and ensures efficient execution with parallel processing . Experience faster development cycles, broader test coverage, and reduced costs with our innovative open-source platform. Get real benefits from the latest technologies customized for you through our network of technology partners. Our Experience Engineering services create tangible outcomes for leading global enterprises.
